title: The Sniper
description: The Salvation Society is the most powerful criminal organization in Southeast Asia. Human trafficking, organ trading, drug manufacturing and drug trafficking are rampant. In 2012, the secret service organization planned to capture the leader of the organization, Songpa, but during the ambush, Jin Ming unexpectedly had to save a boy who was about to have his heart harvested, triggering a fierce battle between the two sides. The final mission ended in failure, and two children were saved. The boy is named Jin Tai, and the girl is named Xiao Mei. Under the guidance of Jin Ming, the two became top snipers ten years later.

title: Drug Hunter
description: In an anti-drug operation in a certain city, the captain of the anti-drug brigade, Yu Fan, and his teammates seized a batch of high-purity drugs from the Golden Triangle. However, both sides of the transaction were extremely cunning and had strong anti-reconnaissance capabilities, leaving not a single valuable clue. After a series of meticulous investigations and judgments, Yufan and others started with Li Yong, the leader of the drug dealer in charge of distribution, and after paying the price of lost lives, they finally outlined a complete drug trafficking network, and successfully locked onto and hid within the network.

title: The Tai Chi Master
description: At the end of the Southern Song Dynasty, the country was troubled by domestic and foreign aggression, and foreign countries were eyeing the dynasty, trying to invade the Central Plains. One day, when the foreign enemies attacked the city, Zhang Junbao, a disciple of the Wuji faction, turned the tide and helped Wei Linchuan, the general of the Song Dynasty, successfully defend the border. Zhang Junbao returned to the sect to participate in the selection ceremony of the sect leader. He was rebellious and had no intention on fighting for the sect leader, but was it plotted against him during the ceremony.

title: SUPER BODYGUARD
description: This film is about a security company's bodyguard, Ye Kai, who is entrusted by medical professor Lin Guohua with the task of protecting Lin Guohua's daughter, Eno, in order to keep his scientific research from falling into the hands of the shady businessman Peter. After experiencing several threats of life and death, they do not give up hope and fight back, and finally overcome the culprit with their firm belief and succeed in preserving Lin's scientific research.

title: Walking to School
description: Walking to School. This film follows a 7-year-old boy, Wawa, and his older sister, Naxiang, who live beside the Nujiang River in Yunnan Province, China. Every day, Naxiang crosses the river to attend school using an overhead cable, but their mother will not allow Wawa to use the cable.

title: Internship Stewardess
description: The comedy-drama film Internship Stewardess tells the story of Zhao Xiaofan (played by Zhao Yihuan), an ordinary girl with extremely poor congenital conditions. In order to realize her dream of becoming a stewardess, she first challenges Liu Zhengzheng (played by Liu Yujue), a beautiful girl from a family of stewardess, and then He also led a group of ordinary girls to fight against a group of beautiful stewardesses from all over the world. In this process, Zhao Xiaofan's tenacity and perseverance were not only recognized by others, but also gained sincere friendship. But just when the situation was looking good, Zhao Xiaofan suddenly discovered that he was suffering from vertigo and could not become an air stewardess at all...

title: Fei Cheng
description: Ghost Town... 《鬼城》讲述了中国西南部偏远村庄知子罗的故事，讲述了其文化历史和中国新经济的严酷现实之间的斗争。这部纪录片由赵大勇执导，亲密地描绘了留下的人物，从一对牧师父子，到面临经济困难的年轻恋人，再到一个为生存而捡破烂的十二岁男孩。

title: The Dragon Nine
description: 衰落的龙族血脉的最后传人，风一帆，意外吞下祖传秘宝龙九丹，神奇生下了天赋异禀的龙九子。九子一出生就能够说话，传说九子的血肉能够自行炼化、聚合，从而获得永生。这导致九子受到诸多邪恶势力的觊觎，于是一家人踏上了逃亡之旅。带着濒死经历的疯狂逃亡之旅让家庭整体成长，也让才华横溢的九子明白了每个人存在的责任和作用。最终，他凭借团队的配合，保护了大家。

title: The Great Illusionist 2
description: 1932年，北海市发生了一系列离奇命案。警探龙聪在调查过程中，发现凶手假借鬼怪之名，利用幻术杀人。最终，龙聪在女记者华翎的协助下，将凶手绳之以法，但背后隐藏的真相却让他难以接受
